title: Mama June has undergone surgery to remove excess skin | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 200 shares 'It hasn't changed my life dramatically. The only difference is that people are able to see the way I look now. 'Before, I used to be told you couldn't tell when I lost weight. But now I know I'm the s**t and you can't tell me nothing!' Needed help: The 37-year-old reality star has told Radar Online that her weight loss is finally evident after she underwent the knife once again The mother of pageant queen Honey Boo Boo is laying low and not showing off her new shape until her show airs, but she says the difference post skin and weight loss surgery is dramatic. 'I've lost at least half of my body,' she said confidently. 'People said yeah that I look good, so I took it to the extreme like everything else.' Under wraps: The mother of pageant queen Honey Boo Boo (pictured 2016) is laying low and not showing off her new shape, but she says the difference post skin and weight loss surgery is dramatic The star has changed her diet as much as she can - but says she is not ready to live off just salads like they do in Hollywood. She told Radar: 'I haven't ate a lot of pasta [sic], no fried foods and baked goods stuff like that. I'm not perfect, but I do give it my 100 percent. Trust me, I'm not eating salads all the time! We do live in the South!' Daughters Alana 'Honey Boo Boo' Thompson and Lauryn 'Pumpkin' Thompson have also benefited. 'The girls have lost a bit of weight too.' In a newly released sneak peek for the WE tv series sees the 37-year-old vowing to get down to a size 4 as she says, 'There is a skinnier person inside of me.' 'I know within time, carrying weight around, I could die,' Mama June says as she weighs in at 354 pounds in the clip. 'This surgery is the scariest thing I've ever done but I mean there is a skinnier person inside of me,' the star says in the clip before undergoing her surgery. 'There is a skinnier person inside of me': The star has a new show WE tv series Mama June: From Not to Hot But Honey Boo Boo looks fearful and isn't so sure her mom should go under the knife. 'I don't think you should do it... because I think you look fine the way you are,' the adorable little girl professes. The short video also shows June working out to look her best and even obtains a drill sergeant-style personal trainer to help achieve her weight loss goals. Slim down: The reality star already showed off a slimmer figure from when she was pictured in March 2013 (L) to November 2015 (R) 'I think you look fine': Alana 'Honey Boo Boo' Thompson, 11, looks fearful and isn't so sure her mom should go under the knife But it's not easy for the mother-of-four as she's also seen indulging in Ben & Jerry's ice cream, fried foods and loading her plate at buffet restaurants. 'I've been working out really hard,' she proclaims to her trainer. 'But you're sabotaging it with this!' he shouts back while holding up pints of ice cream and junk food. Mama June: From Not To Hot, which premieres on February 24 on WEtv.
